_comment: Amir: in the query I used iotime instead unique_time because the table does not have the column. is it OK?
name: performance-based-io-interface
title: Job Performance based on the I/O Interface and Job Size
subtitle: I/O throughput for apps that use only POSIX-IO and those that use MPI-IO for at least one file.

series.name: Mira
series.query: select  iotime, (@csum := @csum + iotime) as cumulative_iotime from jobs_info JOIN (select @csum := 0) r order by iotime desc;
